name: ARF Tests & Coverage

on:
  push:
    branches: [ main ]
  pull_request:
    branches: [ main ]
  workflow_dispatch:  # Allows manual trigger

jobs:
  test:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    strategy:
      matrix:
        python-version: ['3.10', '3.11']
    
    steps:
    - name: ðŸ“¥ Checkout code
      uses: actions/checkout@v4
    
    - name: ðŸ Set up Python ${{ matrix.python-version }}
      uses: actions/setup-python@v4
      with:
        python-version: ${{ matrix.python-version }}
        cache: 'pip'
    
    - name: ðŸ“¦ Install dependencies
      run: |
        python -m pip install --upgrade pip
        pip install -r requirements.txt
        pip install pytest pytest-asyncio pytest-cov pytest-mock pytest-timeout faker
    
    - name: ðŸ§ª Run tests
      run: |
        pytest Test/ -v --tb=short --timeout=30
      continue-on-error: false
    
    - name: ðŸ“Š Generate coverage report
      if: always()
      run: |
        pytest Test/ --cov=app --cov=models --cov=healing_policies --cov-report=term --cov-report=xml
    
    - name: ðŸ“ˆ Upload coverage to artifacts
      if: always()
      uses: actions/upload-artifact@v3
      with:
        name: coverage-report-python-${{ matrix.python-version }}
        path: coverage.xml

  lint:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    steps:
    - name: ðŸ“¥ Checkout code
      uses: actions/checkout@v4
    
    - name: ðŸ Set up Python 3.10
      uses: actions/setup-python@v4
      with:
        python-version: '3.10'
    
    - name: ðŸ“¦ Install linting tools
      run: |
        pip install black ruff mypy
    
    - name: ðŸŽ¨ Check code formatting (Black)
      run: |
        black --check app.py models.py healing_policies.py
      continue-on-error: true
    
    - name: ðŸ” Lint with Ruff
      run: |
        ruff check app.py models.py healing_policies.py
      continue-on-error: true

  security:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    steps:
    - name: ðŸ“¥ Checkout code
      uses: actions/checkout@v4
    
    - name: ðŸ Set up Python 3.10
      uses: actions/setup-python@v4
      with:
        python-version: '3.10'
    
    - name: ðŸ”’ Run security checks (Bandit)
      run: |
        pip install bandit
        bandit -r app.py models.py healing_policies.py -ll
      continue-on-error: true

  summary:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    needs: [test, lint, security]
    if: always()
    steps:
    - name: ðŸ“‹ Test Summary
      run: |
        echo "## Test Results Summary" >> $GITHUB_STEP_SUMMARY
        echo "âœ… Tests completed" >> $GITHUB_STEP_SUMMARY
        echo "âœ… Linting completed" >> $GITHUB_STEP_SUMMARY
        echo "âœ… Security scan completed" >> $GITHUB_STEP_SUMMARY
